    public class WorldWindow
extends MMBFrame
    Author:
    oskar

    WINDOW TABS

    #openWindow(Component, String) - opens a tab without going to it #openAndShowWindow(Component, String) - opens a tab and shows it #closeWindow(Component) - closes a tab
